details.title: Vivian Chatbot
points: Crafted a chatbot trained on company documents using Langchain, LLMs, and ChromaDB.
Developed a custom agent for parsing web pages linked within the documents.
Integrated Django websockets to stream tokens in real-time, enabling responsive interactions.

details.title: Invoice & Contract QA System
points: Built a customizable end-to-end RAG system using Computer Vision for invoice and contract parsing.
Used Sentence Transformers for retrieval and LLMs with prompt engineering for accurate responses.
Achieved ~95% accuracy on invoices and 85% on contracts.
Implemented round-robin queuing with RabbitMQ and PostgreSQL for efficient request handling.
Decomposed the system into microservices for modularity and scalability.

details.title: Social Media RAG System POC
points: Built a RAG system for social media using Langchain and Neo4j for analytics on user profiles and posts.
Used Router chains to generate trendy captions based on engagement metrics.

details.title: Profile Impersonation Detection
points: Developed an API to detect impersonations using textual similarity on usernames and bios.
Fine-tuned a Vision Transformer (HuggingFace + PyTorch) for image similarity on profile pictures.

details.title: Sentiment Analysis on Financial News
points: Built a financial news sentiment classifier using BERT (base) with custom layers.
Achieved 93% accuracy and F1-score.

details.title: XYME-backend (Predictive Modeling Framework)
points: Integrated MLPs, boosting models, and ML features into Accern's No-Code AI platform backend.
Implemented Kafka-based notifications and deployed the system on Kubernetes.

details.title: Accern Data Client

details.title: ESG Dashboard POC
points: Fetched ESG data via API, processed it, and stored it in Snowflake weekly.
Created dashboards in ThoughtSpot leading to deal closures worth $155k and $60k.

details.title: Real-time Human Violence Detection System
points: Built a real-time violence detection system using CCTV/drone footage and OpenPose.
Used joint coordinates to train RNNs (TensorFlow/Keras), achieving 84% classification accuracy.
